messages.title: My pledges to you
messages.content:
1. To be your champion. I have always stood up for you and will continue to do so if re-elected as your MP.
2. To fight for our children’s future. Every child deserves a good teacher and a secure future. Labour’s Conservative school cuts are putting this at risk.
3. To protect skills training and boost opportunities for young people. I’ll carry on fighting to get young people the apprenticeships and quality jobs and opportunities they need.
4. To keep our communities safe and secure. I will always stand up on our side to have the Police numbers we need. I’ll provide access to funds and back community initiatives to keep our neighbourhoods safe.
5. To build a better future. We urgently need more genuinely affordable housing, well-paid jobs and improved transport links and accessible public transport.

leaflet.personalStatement: In all the years I have been your MP I have always stood up for local people, from helping our area rebuild after the dark days of the collapse of MG Rover and the car industry, to fighting for new opportunities today and for the decent homes, jobs and skills our area needs. The Conservatives want this election to produce a Parliament to do as they please and give them a blank cheque. I will never do that. This is my home. Conservative plans to cut school funding by £9m pounds from school budgets in this area affect me and my family. More than that, I believe that every child has a right to a great education, just as I believe that every fight for saving our treasured and precious NHS. I believe in an economy that works and in a future that is fair for all. That’s why I want to see a Labour Government.

endorsements.endorsement: The NHS saved my son's life. We cannot let the Conservatives dismantle it bit by bit. I know Richard will always fight for our Health service that is there for everyone.

Richard is a rare type of politician who actively listens to what young people have to say about education, jobs, about our future and the world around us. Just as important, he does what he says he will.
When our family needed help, Richard was there for us. When we had nowhere else to turn – when we had serious housing problems - it was Richard that listened and he got results.
